file_content.text: Master! No, it's not possible! Master!
What are you waiting for, bounty hunter? Kill me just like you killed my Master! Go on!
You weren't part of the deal. Run for an escape pod.
You're just a bystander.
No one paid you to kill me so you're not interested. Is that it?
I'm turning this ship to dust in a minute. I suggest you not be on it.
I don't want to kill you, kid.
We'll meet again, bounty hunter. I swear it.
I'm glad you let her go. You did the right thing.
I'm glad you approve.
Thanks.
Hey, there's perks to being on my good side.
Ahh kids, so impressionable. You think letting her go was a good idea?
We've got bigger problems to deal with.
She's not a priority.
You have me there.
There was no reason to kill her.
She wasn't who I was after.
That's a very good point.
Want to take bets on that?
I may live to regret it. We'll see.
Could have been a bad idea.
Hey, what's one more enemy, right? Keeps life interesting.
Oh, I have no doubt. Personally, I would've shot her.
Your Master died on his feet. You won't.
Suit yourself. [Kill Thendys]
She was no threat to you.
I'm surprised you killed her.
Not in the mood for a lecture.
Save it.
Seemed like a good idea at the time.
She was asking for it.
Well, it's too late now.
I don't leave loose ends.
She was a witness.
Fine. Don't mind me.
The cruiser can be set to jump into hyperspace at the bridge controls. Deactivating the tractor beam would also be a good idea.
Then, I'd blast the control panel just to be sure no one reverses what you've done. Then we run!
Don't get me wrong. I would've killed her too. I just didn't figure she'd be much sport for you.
We should set the cruiser to jump into hyperspace and deactivate the tractor beam before anyone else decides to show up.
And don't forget to blast the control panel. Then we run!
